text: James Henderson "Jimmy" Finlayson (August 27, 1887 â€“ October 9, 1953) was a Scottish-American actor who worked in both silent and sound comedies. Finlayson was bald, with a fake moustache, and had many trademark comic mannerisms and is famous for his squinting, outrageous "double-take, "fade away" head reaction, and characteristic expression D'oh!. == Other websites == * * James Finlayson Biography * Yes Yes Nanette Public domain short comedy for free download Category:1887 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Jimmy Finlayson
